name: Crossing Fury
description:
Control the traffic lights on the busy street to let pedestrians cross the street safely or to send them to the hell ! The choice is yours !!

HOW TO PLAY

Click and hold the left-bottom of the screen to reverse the indication of the traffic light for cars. (from green to red, from red to green, from yellow to green)

Click and hold the right-bottom of the screen to reverse the indication of the traffic light for pedestrians. (from green to red, from red to green, from blinking green to red)

You can change your point of view by dragging on the screen and zoom in/out by mouse wheel.

Cars and pedestrians obey traffic lights meekly except in following conditions:

- Cars and pedestrians forced to  wait  for a long time

- Pedestrians faced blinking green light (they start to run)

- Cars involved with explosion

There are 3 game modes: GOOD, EVIL and NEUTRALl.

GOOD MODE

Your objective is to earn 'Savepoint' by letting pedestrians and cars pass safely.

EVIL MODE

Your objective is to earn 'Killpoint' by killing pedestrians and destroying cars.

NEUTRAL MODE

To save or kill them, it's your choice. no time limits and no criteria for level-up. 

In GOOD and EVIL mode you have to qualify SUCCESS criterion in time. however even though the time is remaining, you will fail if you reach to FAILURE criterion.

In NEUTRAL mode, click 'QUIT' button on the configuration menu to quit the game. The level applied in this mode is the lower level you have achieved in the both Good and Evil modes.
